Package camzup.core

Class MaterialSolid

java.lang.Object
camzup.core.EntityData
camzup.core.Material
camzup.core.MaterialSolid
All Implemented Interfaces:
IEntityData, IMaterial, IUtils
public class MaterialSolid extends Material
A material which holds data to display materials with solid colors only (no textures, or patterns). Contains data for a fill and/or stroke.

  • Field Summary

    Modifier and Type
    Field

    The weight, or width, of the stroke.

    Whether or not to display a shape with a fill.
    boolean
    useStroke
    Whether or not to display a shape with a stroke.

  • Constructor Details

    • MaterialSolid

      public MaterialSolid()
      The default constructor.

    • MaterialSolid

      public MaterialSolid(Color fill)
      Creates a material from a fill color.
      Parameters:
      fill - the fill color

    • MaterialSolid

      public MaterialSolid(Color fill, Color stroke, float strokeWeight)
      Creates a material from a fill, stroke color and stroke weight. Whether or not to use a fill is inferred from the fill's alpha; whether or not to use stroke is inferred from the stroke weight and stroke color's alpha.
      Parameters:
      fill - the fill color
      stroke - the stroke color
      strokeWeight - the stroke weight

    • MaterialSolid

      public MaterialSolid(Color fill, Color stroke, float strokeWeight, boolean useFill, boolean useStroke)
      Creates a solid material by component.
      Parameters:
      fill - the fill color
      stroke - the stroke color
      strokeWeight - the stroke weight
      useFill - whether to use fill
      useStroke - whether to use stroke

    • MaterialSolid

      public MaterialSolid(String name, Color fill, Color stroke, float strokeWeight)
      Creates a named material from a fill, stroke color and stroke weight. Whether or not to use a fill is inferred from the fill's alpha; whether or not to use stroke is inferred from the stroke weight and stroke color's alpha.
      Parameters:
      name - the name
      fill - the fill color
      stroke - the stroke color
      strokeWeight - the stroke weight
